body_html: We recently reworked size_average and reduce to a single reduction argument. I think the right way to approach this is to add additional options in reduction to specify a weighted vs unweighted average.

body: We recently reworked size_average and reduce to a single reduction argument. I think the right way to approach this is to add additional options in reduction to specify a weighted vs unweighted average.
